segments.text: Hi Steve . What do you think of the new supplier ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We haven't had any problems so far . They offer a 24 - hour technical back-up service . We've called them in three times this month . They always arrive within a couple of hours .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's good service . Do we have to pay extra for that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . There's no call-out fee . It's included in the annual service contract .
segments.speaker: S2
